_stream¶
read(*, is_multi_root=False)¶

Read the ABX file :param is_multi_root: some xml files on Android contain multiple root elements making reading them using a document model problematic. For these files, set is_multi_root to True and the output ElementTree will wrap the elements in a single “root” element. :return: ElementTree representation of the data.
